title: Kylie Jenner shares video of daughter Stormi playing basketball
text:
Kylie Jenner has a new skincare product coming out, and her one-year-old daughter Stormi wants it.

The 22-year-old took to her Instagram on Monday afternoon to show her toddler playing with a bottle of her face mask before lathering it onto her face.

After the little one got all cleaned up, the two headed outside where Stormi tried her hand at some basketball.

Skincare fan: Kylie Jenner took to her Instagram on Monday afternoon to show her toddler Stormi playing with a bottle of her face mask before lathering it onto her face

Young star: Kylie also shared a video of Stormi playing basketball

In the video, Stormi is seen with the makeup mogul's latest beauty product as she tries to get some into her hands.

Jenner then helps her daughter by putting a bit into her palms before Stormi gets excited and smothers it all over her face.

She seemed happy with her work as she smiled into her mom's iPhone camera.

Having fun! Jenner then helps her daughter by putting a bit into her palms before Stormi gets excited and smothers it all over her face

Needing help: In the video, Stormi is seen with the makeup mogul's latest beauty product as she tries to get some into her hands

What to do next? She rubbed the product on her face and didn't seem sure what to do next

After she got cleaned up, the mother and daughter duo headed outside for some basketball.

She appeared to be bundled up in a white hoodie and black coat as she scampered around with a basketball trying to make it into the basket.

'Reach for the stars baby,' Kylie commented on the video of her daughter trying to jump hoping to make the shot.

Almost! She appeared to be bundled up in a white hoodie and black coat as she scampered around with a basketball trying to make it into the basket

Next time! 'Reach for the stars baby,' Kylie commented on the video of her daughter trying to jump hoping to make the shot

The video comes after Kylie shared a video of the 20-month-old on Sunday night with her dressed up as her 2019 Met Gala look, wig and all.

Stormi stood there in the identical look, but internet trolls were quick to point out the little girl didn't look too comfortable.

'I want to say this is beyond weird/ bad/ inappropriate... But then do we expect anything other than that from this family? Those children are going to be in therapy from the age of ten!' one user commented on the photo.

'This is ... really weird and vain and a little creepy,' another user commented.

Met look: The video comes after Kylie shared a video of the 20-month-old on Sunday night with her dressed up as her 2019 Met Gala look, wig and all

Not okay: Stormi stood there in the identical look, but internet trolls were quick to point out the little girl didn't look too comfortable
description:
Kylie Jenner has a new skincare product coming out, and her one-year-old daughter Stormi wants it.
The 22-year-old took to her Instagram on Monday afternoon to show her toddler playing.
